title: Championship Jewels
body:
Just wondering, in the crafting section it seems you can fuse three championship jewels together, does anyone know what you get from this?

Thanks

replies.body:
I wasn't able to find anything mentioning combining 3 championship jewels together in our [Worlds 2016 Guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-)

Can you [give me a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) or more details of what you mean?
Sorry, I realised I made a mistake, got it all together now. Still thanks for taking some time.
Yeah, I realised with some searching around that this was a stupid question. -.- well, good job myself.
